title: About
text:
I am a 3rd year student at the University of Toronto pursuing Applied Maths for Finance and Economics. I am interested in the financial industry as I enjoy its multi-faceted, and I believe it plays to my many strengths. I am currently interning at a search fund, and interned at a venture capital fund last summer. I am a part of two clubs on campus: Rational Capital Investment Fund (RCIF) and Global Research and Consulting Group (GRC). I am an international student whose grown up in Mauritius and Dubai.
I have written an article as part of GRC on Renewable Energy Investing.
I have written two papers as part of my STA302 course: Paper 1, Paper 2
